Module com.example.project4
Package Project4

Class PizzaCustomController

java.lang.Object
Project4.PizzaCustomController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PizzaCustomController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Controller for the pizza customization GUI, handles pizza customization GUI events
Author:
Nicholas Triano, Antonio Ignarra

    • setSelectedToppingsList

      public void setSelectedToppingsList(ArrayList<Toppings> toppings)
      Helper method to set the selected toppings list view in PizzaCustomView
      Parameters:
      toppings - arraylist of toppings to show in the list view

    • handleAddButton

      protected void handleAddButton()
      Handles add topping button press, adds topping to selected list view and removes from total toppings list view. Constraint is set to 7 toppings max selected.

    • handleRemoveButton

      protected void handleRemoveButton()
      Handles remove topping button press, removes topping from selected list view and adds to total toppings list view. Calls checkValidRemove() method, removing default toppings is rejected.

    • handleAddToOrder

      protected void handleAddToOrder()
      Handles add to order button press. Adds pizza to order and closes window

    • handleComboBox

      protected void handleComboBox()
      Handles selection of size combo box item and sets the price accordingly based on quantity

    • handleChoiceBox

      protected void handleChoiceBox()
      Handles selection of quantity combo box item and sets price accordingly

    • checkValidRemove

      private boolean checkValidRemove()
      Helper method for handleRemoveButton(). checks invalid removal of default toppings
      Returns:
      true if there is no violation, false if there is a violation
